content: Had I started to socialize with people in the past, maybe I would be a different person now, but, because of the shy disposition I had at that time, now I really have few friends.
translations: ita:Se solo in passato avessi iniziato a socializzare con la gente, a quest'ora forse sarei un'altra persona, ma, a causa de
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by unknown (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
